title: Grant Shapps – 2022 Comments in Favour of 45p Tax Rate Reversal
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Grant Shapps, the Conservative MP for Welwyn Hatfield, on Twitter on 3 October 2022.
content:
Strongly welcome today’s 45p tax reversal. Sensible & pragmatic.
  *[ERSA]: Employment Related Services Association
  *[HS2]: High Speed Two
  *[GPs]: general practitioners

Conservatives want lower tax, but let’s show our energy price cap + other policies are on side of consumers rather than borrowing to cut high earner taxes first.
  *[ERSA]: Employment Related Services Association
  *[HS2]: High Speed Two
  *[GPs]: general practitioners

Chx backs down on 45p tax.
  *[ERSA]: Employment Related Services Association
  *[HS2]: High Speed Two
  *[GPs]: general practitioners
